description: In the BtoB SaaS domain, led phased infrastructure renewal leveraging existing assets across multiple projects to address technical debt and admin platform extensibility challenges arising from product growth.

As Frontend Tech Lead, consistently owned end-to-end responsibilities from architecture design and tech selection to implementation policy and review process establishment, driving both team development efficiency and quality.
In tech selection, prioritize trade-off decisions encompassing not just development efficiency but also long-term operability, team productivity, and business continuity.
